title: how to change batch size for training
body:
Thanks for opening this issue, and thanks for using DeepLabCut (we hope you are enjoying it ;). Please fill out the template completely, including the full "traceback" and input code that you ran to hit this error. **Your Operating system and DeepLabCut version** Ubuntu 16.04.6 LTS with Anconda Env DLC-GPU & DeepLabCut2.2b5 Please complete the following information about your system: OS: Ubuntu Linux DeepLabCut Version: 2.2b5 Anaconda env used: DLC-GPU **Describe the problem** Edit config.yaml to change batch_size from 8 to 1 Then run: deeplabcut.train_network(path_config_file) and it shows as batch_size = 8 This is important because I am getting resource allocation error running RTX2080Ti on 1024x768 images. If I manually edit the pose_cfg.yaml file in the right sub-folder inside dlc-models folder, setting batch_size = 1, then the training can run without error, but it shouldn't have to be done this way. Setting it in the main config.yaml should be enough. Please place code inside this:
